name: supercriminal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a very dangerous or powerful criminal, especially in stories or films: She returns to the city at the same time as a supercriminal is released from jail. The heroine is a super-criminal who becomes a spy.
More examplesFewer examplesHis day is thrown into chaos when a supercriminal hijacks his private jet.It's the story of a real-life Detroit super-criminal.He plays a super-criminal who really believes he's done nothing wrong.They vowed to rid the city of supercriminals.He is recruited by the police to help deal with a powerful new super-criminal.
